channel.title: Projects on Andrew Murray
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Andrew Murray

item.title: Domestic Wells and Fracking
item.description: Methane Contamination of Wells In recent years, the practice of hydraulic fracturing has raised concerns among those who obtain domestic water for home use from privately owned wells in areas that have been experienceing development of unconventional natural gas extraction (fracking) activities. This is a living document of my research investigating the potential risk to private wells from contamination relating to fracking throughout the United States. The goal of this document is for it to be submitted as a manuscript once it is completed.

item.title: Carbon Flux
item.description: Flux From North Carolina Streams The varying rates at which carbon migrates from freshwater streams into the atmosphere is poorly understood. This research aims to understand how carbon flux from freshwater streams to the atmosphere varies depending on variables such as discharge, stream slope, and land use. summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.
